content:
pio Valenzuela

Santa Rosa residents gather to listen to friends and family of  missing students from Ayotzinapa Mexico April  at Carpenters Hall Santa Rosa

Pio Valenzuela Staff WriterApril  

A caravan of justice traveling through the United States comprising the families from Ayotzinapa representing  students kidnapped by the Mexican government urged the American people to speak out against the governments role in Mexican militarization PERIOD
The speakers addressed a full house on April  at Carpenter Hall in Santa Rosa in Spanish while a translator repeated the speeches in English PERIOD
We are thinking of our children PERIOD We are living with the thoughts of whether they ate today whether theyre cold  and this is tormenting us PERIOD All  mothers its killing us little by little said Blanca Luz Nava Velez mother of Jorge Alvarez Nava one of the  missing students from Ayotzinapa PERIOD
Parents friends and even victims present during the attack spoke about the incident on the night of Sept PERIOD  through the morning of the twenty-seventh that resulted in six students deaths and dozens more missing PERIOD
We are not going to rest until we find them PERIOD We are not going to stop ever until we know where they are where the government has them Velez said PERIOD
The police in Mexico attacked her son Jorge and several others in September  while students commandeered buses in Iguala Guerrero  a common practice according to the students  for a march commemorating a  massacre of students at Tlatelolco PERIOD
Weve been asking the government to give us this resource  of having transportation having buses that we could use for what we need to do but that still hadnt been resolved so thats why in this day and age were still having to do things like this said Angel Neri de la Cruz Ayala one of the students present during the attack PERIOD
He continuedWhen we were on our way back the municipal police started shooting at us. cruz Ayala told the story of the  missing the six dead and many others wounded after Mexican police and armed forces shot at them PERIOD Similar caravans of buses traveled throughout Mexico and the U.S PERIOD
Their goal is to convince the U.S PERIOD government through gaining American citizens support to halt military and police aid to Mexico until the Mexican government stops violating its citizens human rights PERIOD

Caravana para Justicia Familias de los  estudiantes Mexicanos viajan para difundir su mensaje
traducido por Pio Valenzuela and Chantelle Bogue
Viajando por los Estados Unidos en una procesin de justicia familias representando los  estudiantes secuestrandos por el gobierno Mexicano buscan convencer al gobierno estadounidense de parar el apoyo de armas a la polica y las fuerzas armadas de Mxico PERIOD
Los oradores hablaron el  de abril en Carpenters Hall Santa Rosa en espaol mientras una traductora repiti el discurso despus PERIOD
Pensamos en nuestros jvenes Todas las noches todos los das uno est pensando cmo est si comio hoy si tiene fro PERIOD Todo eso es un tormento para uno PERIOD Tan solo pensar nos est matando poco a poco dijo Blanca Luz Nava Vlez madre de Jorge lvarez Nava uno de los  perdidos PERIOD
Padres amigos y vctimas del ataque le comentaron a una gran cantidad de oyentes acerca del incidente que ocurri la noche del  de Septiembre hacia la maana del  que result en la muerte de seis estudiantes y en el secuestro de docenas ms PERIOD
No vamos a descansar hasta encontrarlos PERIOD No vamos aparar nunca hasta que sepamos de nuestros hijos  donde estn y donde los tienen Velez dijo PERIOD
Su hijo Jorge y otros fueron atacados en Septiembre del ao pasado mientras estudiantes requisaron autobuses  una practica comn de acuerdo con los estudiantes  para una marcha que conmemoraba La Noche de Tlatelolco una masacre de estudiantes en  PERIOD
Angel Neri de la Cruz Ayala un estudiante presente durante el ataque dijo que le haban estado pidiendo al gobierno Mexicano autobuses para que pudieran tener transporte para la marcha pero que an no se haba resuelto por eso hoy en da todaba tienen que hacer cosas como esas PERIOD
El continuo Cuando estbamos regresando la polica municipales empez a disparar contra nosotros. cruz Ayala recont su historia y la historia de los  perdidos los seis muertos y los otros heridos despus del ataque por la polica y las fuerzas armadas PERIOD
Caravanas similares viajaron por Mxico y siguen viajando por los E.E.U.U PERIOD
Su meta es que la gente estadounidense convence su gobierno que se pare el apoyo militar a la polica y fuerzas armadas de Mxico PERIOD
